name: Galpa The No Limbs Guy beta
name_original: Galpa The No Limbs Guy beta
description:
galpa found a weird pipe that show up at his house then he got sucked in and now he is trying to get back home

this game in still in beta and has plans of it coming out in 2022

use the arrow keys to move and use z to jump and x to punch 

you can use a controller to play to

updates

galpa web beta 6 aka the level 1 build

added a whole new level called level 1

fixed a bug where the animation would bug out then punching a enemy

fixed a bug where you don't die if the square enemy falls on you

added moving platfroms

galpa web beta 5

added a animation when going to level

galpa web beta 4 aka galpa beta 4

added a new enemy tringle enemy it does not move but you can't jump on it you have to punch it

fixed a bug where the loading screen icon does not fill the whole thing
